weekly_top_story.headline: CMS launches initiative to verify citizenship and immigration status of Medicaid and CHIP enrollees
weekly_top_story.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) announced a new oversight initiative to verify the citizenship and immigration status of individuals enrolled in Medicaid and CHIP, aiming to ensure program integrity and compliance.
weekly_top_story.source: Alston & Bird Health Care Week in Review

stories.headline: House Committee advances 7% cut to Labor, Health and Human Services funding bill
stories.summary: The House Committee on Appropriations moved forward a funding bill reducing Labor, Health and Human Services appropriations by 7%, totaling $184.5 billion, impacting health programs and services amid looming government funding deadlines.

stories.headline: Rise in poison center calls tied to self-harm among preteens alarms healthcare providers
stories.summary: Data indicates a 311% increase in poison center calls related to suspected self-harm or suicidal intent among children aged 6 to 12 from 2000 to 2023, highlighting growing mental health challenges in younger populations.
